name: ToDo:Read
body:
# Welcome to **ToDo:Read** home page.

## What is **ToDo:Read**?

**ToDo:Read** is application for reading articles you have postponed.

Support for Read It Later service enables you to read articles anytime from your mobile device.

This application also allows you to download the articles for reading offline.

![Screenshot on Harmattan](https://github.com/rnovacek/todoread/wiki/todoread-screen-harmattan.png)

# Platforms

**ToDo:Read** currently runs only on Meego/Harmattan (Nokia N9 and Nokia N950).

## Where can I get it?

TODO: add link to .deb package and OVI store later.

## Issues

Please report any issues and feature requests to [Issue tracker](https://github.com/rnovacek/todoread/issues).
tagline: Application for reading articles you've postponed
